title: Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do         Practicing being a paleontologist. NPS Photo  While visiting Hagerman Fossil Beds be sure to spend some time exploring the Visitor Center, located in town on Rt. 30 across from the high school. You can watch our informational DVD, dig like a paleontologist, examine fossil replicas, and marvel at our fossil displays.        Visitors enjoy a Paleo Porch program conducted by the paleontological staff. NPS Photo  Seasonal programs allow visitors to learn more about the fossils and the amazing history behind the Hagerman Fossil Beds. Check our Schedule of Events for the latest offerings.        Fossils are fun! NPS Photo  You are never too young to be captivated by fossils. Our seasonal Ranger programs allow people of all ages to explore the wonderful world of fossils.
